about.title: Our Story
about.description: Founded in 2019, CLUSTER COFFEE has been dedicated to bringing the finest coffee experiences to our community. We source our beans directly from sustainable farms across the globe, ensuring both quality and ethical practices.
about.craftsmanship: Our master roasters carefully craft each batch to perfection, bringing out the unique characteristics of every bean. We believe in creating not just great coffee, but memorable experiences that bring people together.

headers.description: Experience the perfect blend of tradition and innovation in every cup. Handcrafted coffee for true connoisseurs.

feature.title: Featured Menu
feature.description: Discover our carefully curated selection of signature drinks and dishes, crafted with precision and passion.

collaborator.title: Our Collaborators
collaborator.description: Join us in creating unforgettable coffee experiences.

blogs.title: Our Blogs
blogs.description: Discover the latest news and updates from our blog.

testimoni.title: What Our Customers Say
testimoni.description: Read what our valued customers have to say about their experiences at CLUSTER COFFEE.

reservationButton.title: Have a Question?
reservationButton.description: Want to know more about our coffee, menu specials, or collaboration opportunities? We're here to help!

footer.description: Coffee can be a medium to help us enter certain moments.

location.title: Location
location.street: Ratna Niaga No.30, Kota Baru Parahyangan
